page.title: 17HOW WE SPEND OUR SPARE TIME
page.content: Martin tells us how he spends his free time. "I go to Marshalls Cross football club every week. We sometimes have a match against other teams. There are seventeen boys in the club. I play 'midfield' position. The club is on a Saturday morning from a quarter past ten to twelve o'clock. I like going because I enjoy playing football and I also make new friends. When we have finished playing football we go into the Sports' Hall and watch some men playing five-a-side football. The club is used by many other organisations for keep-fit, aerobics and yoga as well as for badminton, circuit training and all youth clubs use the facilities.
